bike.description: OCLV Carbon co-molded main frame and rear swingarm, G2 geometry, E2 head tube, ABP, topswing carbon link, 110mm travel
bike.paint_description: Matte Vintage Gray/Matte Black Titanite/Matte Crystal White Pea

components.description: Bontrager Race X Lite FCC 29, 28 hole
Bontrager Race XXX Lite ACC, 31.6mm, 5mm offset
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Big Sweep, 12 degree sweep
Avid XO hydraulic disc brakes, center lock; G3 160mm rotors
Trek fork and shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
